work-item.field:
The first Workflow Extension

To start with an own plugin it is always a good idea to reuse an existing example.
In this case
  • use the workflow example from "C:\Polarion\polarion\SDK\examples\com.polarion.example.workflow".
  • Import this example project to Eclipse.
  • Have a look at the included Java files to see what it does.
Make the plugin run directly from Eclipse. The SDK guide holds a step by step instruction to configure the target environment.
  • Follow the steps in ChapterÂ 4.2 "Workspace Preparation" contained in SDK.pdf
If everything works as expected, export your plugin to the Polarion installation.
  • Follow the steps in chapter 4.3 "Deployment to Installed Polarion" contained in SDK.pd
